name: Him (apollock0308)
description:
Isaac died a year ago today. Time marches on, even after his untimely demise. His twin sister Ailene just won't accept it. She can't accept it. It's gone on too long and Isaac knows he finally has to put a stop to it once and for all.

https://writeradrianprince.wixsite.com/adrianprince?fbclid=IwAR07dPUqY8BkzGY-SWH...
